title: A platform designed to manage and track donations for various causes.
description: In this project, I implemented various functionalities using HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. The website primarily focuses on design. While it provides a solid foundation, there are areas that can be improved, such as adding more dynamic features and enhancing user interactivity. Feel free to explore my website to see its potential and current features.
